title: Drink Champs: THE HANGOVER (Recap of Ep. 199 w/ Shawn Pen aka Little Shawn & Gabe The Jeweler)
itunes:title: Drink Champs: THE HANGOVER (Recap of Ep. 199 w/ Shawn Pen aka Little Shawn & Gabe The Jeweler)
description:
Drink Champs: THE HANGOVER - In this edition of The Hangover, DJ EFN joins the party while Sunny D BET almost throws up! This week we try to recap our conversation with Shawn Pen aka Little Shawn and Gabe The Jeweler of Rafaello And Co!

Check out as Hazardis Soundz, Mr. Lee, Boris aka BeatsNdaHood, Sunny D and DJ EFN share some of their favorite moments from this weeks episode!

Follow:

Drink Champs

http://www.drinkchamps.com

http://www.instagram.com/drinkchamps

http://www.twitter.com/drinkchamps

http://www.facebook.com/drinkchamps

http://www.twitter.com/noreaga

http://www.instagram.com/sunnydbet

Mr. Lee

http://www.instagram.com/starrockent

Hazardis Soundz

http://www.instagram.com/hazardissoundz

--- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/drinkchamps/support
